name: RollPitchYaw (Tyst)
description:
This is a puzzle game in which you roll the cube, to control what's inside of it. 

Your goal is to drop down on the green cube with blue one, from distance of at least one block above. During game you will encounter purple cubes that are affected by gravity, and red cubes, which will crush you if they fall on you.

Controls: 

Q, E, W, S, A. D - Rolls the cube, it uses local angles, use help rings, to find out where cube will rotate

Z - Show/hide control rings

R - Hold to restart

O, P - Change level, used for debugging, but feel free to skip levels if they are too hard

M - Mute

This game was made for #153 Weekly Game Jam, theme: Roll
